Verses: 1 kaanaan Dhesaththil Nadandha Sagala Yuththangalaiyum Ariyaadhirundha Isravelaraagiya Anaivaraiyum Sodhippadharkaagavum,
2 isravel Puththirarin Sandhadhiyaarum Adharkumun Yuththancheyya Ariyaadhirundhavargalum Avaigalai Ariyumpadi Pazhakkuvippadharkaagavum, Karththarvittuvaiththa Jaadhigal Yaarendraal:
3 pelistharin Aindhu Adhipadhigalum, Sagala Kaanaaniyarum, Seedhoniyarum, Paagaal Ermon Thuvakki Aamaaththirkul Pravesikkum Varaikkum Leebanonin Malaigalile Kudiyirukkira Eviyarume.
4 karththar Moseyaikkondu Thangal Pidhaakkalukku Vidhiththa Karpanaigalukku Isravelar Keezhppadivaargalo Endru Ariyumpadi, Isravelarai Avargalaale Sodhippadharkaaga Avargal Vidappattirundhaargal.
5 ippadi Isravel Puththirar, Kaanaaniyar, Eththiyar, Emoriyar,perisiyar, Eviyar, Eboosiyaraagiya Ivargal Naduve Kudiyirundhu,
6 avargaludaiya Kumaaraththigalai Vivaagampanni, Thangaludaiya Kumaaraththigalai Avargal Kumaararukkuk Koduththu, Avargal Dhevargalai Seviththaargal.
7 ippadi Isravel Puththirar Karththarin Paarvaikkup Pollaappaanadhai Seydhu, Thangal Dhevanaagiya Karththarai Marandhu, Paagaalgalaiyum Thoppu Vikkiragangalaiyum Sevikkirapodhu,

8 karththar Isravelin Mel Kobamoondavaraagi, Avargalai Mesoppoththaamiyaavin Raajaavaagiya Koosaanrishadhaayeemin Kaiyile Vitruppottaar; Ippadiye Isravel Puththirar Koosaanrishadhaayeemai Ettu Varusham Seviththaargal.

9 isravel Puththirar Karththarai Nokkik Kooppittapodhu, Karththar Isravel Puththirarai Ratchikkumpadi Kaalebin Thambiyaana Kenaasudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Odhniyel Ennum Oru Ratchaganai Avargalukku Ezhumbappanninaar.

10 avan Mel Karththarudaiya Aavi Vandhirundhadhinaal, Avan Isravelai Nyaayam Visaariththu, Yuththampannap Purappattaan; Karththar Mesoppoththaamiyaavin Raajaavaagiya Koosaanrishadhaayeemai Avan Kaiyile Oppukkoduththaar; Aagaiyaal Avan Kai Koosaanrishadhaayeemin Mel Balankondadhu.
11 dhesam Naarpadhu Varusham Amaidhalaayirundhadhu. Kenaasin Kumaaranaagiya Odhniyel Maranamadaindhaan.

12 isravel Puththirar Marupadiyum Karththarin Paarvaikkup Pollaappaanadhai Seydhaargal; Avargal Karththarin Paarvaikkup Pollaappaanadhai Seydhapadiyaal, Karththar Eklon Ennum Movaabin Raajaavai Isravelukku Virodhamaai Balakkappanninaar.
13 avan Ammon Puththiraraiyum Amalekkiyaraiyum Koottikkonduvandhu, Isravelai Muriya Adiththaan; Pereechchamarangalin Pattanaththaiyum Pidiththaan.
14 ippadiye Isravel Puththirar Eklon Ennum Movaabin Raajaavaip Padhinettu Varusham Seviththaargal.

15 isravel Puththirar Karththarai Nokkik Kooppittapodhu, Karththar Avargalukku Benyameen Koththiraththaanaagiya Keraavin Magan Ekoodh Ennum Ratchaganai Ezhumbappanninaar; Avan Idadhukaip Pazhakkamullavanaayirundhaan; Avan Kaiyile Isravel Puththirar Movaabin Raajaavaagiya Eklonukkuk Kaanikkai Anuppinaargal.
16 ekoodh, Irupuramum Karukkum Oru Muzha Neelamumaana Oru Kaththiyai Undupanni, Adhaith Than Vasthiraththukkulle Than Valadhupuraththu Iduppile Kattikkondu,
17 kaanikkaiyai Movaabin Raajaavaagiya Eklonukku Seluththinaan; Eklon Migavum Sthooliththa ManushanaayirundhaanÂ .
18 avan Kaanikkaiyai Seluththiththeerndhapinbu, Kaanikkaiyai Sumandhu Vandha Janangalai Anuppivittaan.

19 avano Kilkaalilulla Silaigal Irukkum Idaththilirundhu Thirumbivandhu; Raajaave, Ummidaththil Sollavendiya Ragasiyamaana Oru Vaarththai Undu Endraan. Adharku Avan: Poru Endraan; Appozhudhu Avanidaththil Nindra Yaavarum Avanai Vittu Veliye Poi Vittaargal.

20 ekoodh Avan Kitte Ponaan; Avano Thanakkuth Thanippura Irundha Kulirchchiyaana Araiveettil Utkaarndhirundhaan; Appozhudhu Ekoodh: Ummidaththil Sollavendiya Dhevavaakku Enakku Undu Endraan; Avan Than Aasanaththilirundhu Ezhundhirundhaan.
21 udane Ekooth Than Idadhukaiyai Neetti, Than Valadhupuraththu Iduppile Kattiyirundha Kaththiyai Uruvi, Adhai Avan Vayitrirkul Paaichchinaan.
22 alagodekoodak Kaippidiyum Ulle Pugundhadhu; Avanudaiya Vayitrukkul Pona Kaththiyai Ivan Izhukkak Koodaadhapadikku, Ninam Alagai Sutrik Kondadaiththadhu; Adhu Pin Puraththile Purappattadhu.
23 ekoodh Purappattu, Araiveettin Kadhavai Saaththip Poottippottu, Koluk Koodaththin Vazhiyaaip Poivittaan.
24 avan Ponapinbu Oozhiyakkaarar Vandhu Paarththaargal; Idho, Araiveettin Kadhavu Poottiyirundhadhu; Aagaiyaal Avar Andhak Kulirchchiyaana Araiyile Malajalaadhikkirukkiraaraakkum Endraargal.

25 avargal Saliththuppogumattum Kaaththirundhaargal; Avan Araiveettin Kadhavaith Thirakkavillai; Aagaiyaal Oru Thiravukolai Eduththuth Thirandhaargal; Idho, Avargal Aandavan Tharaiyile Seththukkidandhaan.
26 avargal Thaamadhiththukkondirundhapodhu, Ekoodh Odippoi, Silaigalulla Idaththaik Kadandhu, Seyiraaththai Serndhu Thappinaan.
27 ange Vandhapodhu Eppiraayeem Malaiyil Ekkaalam Oodhinaan; Appozhudhu Isravel Puththirar Avanodekooda Malaiyilirundhu Iranginaargal; Avan Avargalukku Munbaaga Nadandhu;

28 ennaip Pinthodarndhu Vaarungal; Karththar Ungal Pagaignaraagiya Movaabiyarai Ungal Kaigalil Oppukkoduththaar Endraan. Avargal Avanaip Pinthodarndhupoi, Movaabukku Edhiraana Yordhaan Thuraigalaip Pidiththu, Oruvanaiyum Kadandhupogavottaamal,
29 akkaalaththile Movaabiyaril Erakkuraiyap Padhinaayiram Perai Vettinaargal; Avargalellaarum Pushtiyullavargalum Paraakkiramasaaligalumaayirundhaargal; Avargalil Oruvanum Thappavillai.
30 ippadiye Annaalile Movaab Israveludaiya Kaiyinkeezhth Thaazhththappattadhu; Adhanaale Dhesam Enbadhu Varusham Amaidhalaayirundhadhu.
31 avanukkuppirpaadu Aanaaththin Kumaaran Samkaar Ezhumbinaan; Avan Pelistharil Arunooruperai Oru Thaatrukkolaal Muriya Adiththaan; Avanum Isravelai Ratchiththaan.
